author: National Bureau
text:
The government has updated the guidance note issued to ensure compliance with the reporting standards needed to conform to the inter-governmental information sharing agreements it has entered into.

“A guidance note was released on August 31, 2015 for ensuring compliance with the reporting requirements provided in Rules 114F to 114H and Form 61B of the Income-tax Rules, 1962. Based on the comments and feedback received, this guidance note has been updated on December 31, 2015,” the government said in a release on Thursday.
title: Govt. updates guidance note on tax information
